item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

Well here it is, back by popular demand, something that could change your life. This Vision Board Workshop is designed to inspire and help you gain a clear picture to your true Life’s Desires. Your New Beginning is starting now! Let's work together, Start now by putting your best Life ever into ACTION. This opportunity is here, now, so nothing is stopping you from your GOALS in life! This event is always well attended so call, email or respond ASAP. Please Bring your favorite magazine, I will supply the rest of the materials. If you have created a Vision Board please bring it with you. If you have not, don't worry about it, this workshop is about creating.

 

We will be meeting from 7:00pm-9:00 pm in a Private Home near Medford Center, Medford MA.
If you are NEW to the Group and interested in signing up PLEASE CALL for DIRECTIONS.
See you there!

If this is your first time attending, Please call for directions
Ellen
Motivational Facilitator
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: 2012 The Year of Change - Creating a Vision Board
